articles.description: The Moto E6i is a basic Android phone that costs around $200. At launch, customers can pick this one up in either Titanium Gray or Pink.
articles.content: Motorola made headlines quite often at this start of the year, even though the US company launched few products in 2021. If you've been following our news feed, then you probably know Motorola has a … [+1221 chars]
